summary: The code defines a template for the "framediff_detector" processor, which takes an optional "timestep" parameter and a media file as input. It may check moving areas, total movements, and local movements, differentiating it from frame border detector.

details.comment: The code defines a template for the "framediff_detector" processor, which takes an optional "timestep" parameter and a media file as input. It may check moving areas, total movements, and local movements, differentiating it from frame border detector.
